dc:title: Catholic Worker Celebrates 3rd Birthday; A Restatement of C. W. Aims and Ideals
dc:creator: Dorothy Day
dc:description: Restatement of core Catholic Worker ideals regarding private property, class war, interracial relations, atheism, Marxism, fascism, Communism, materialism, and the role of the state.
dc:identifier: Dorothy Day Library on the Web document 300 1936-05-05 James Allaire Creative Commons Non-Commercial Share Alike 3.0 en-US http://www.catholicworker.org/dorothyday
